scripts.build-all: npm run delete-all-build && npm run remove-dist && electron-packager . agent-transparency-tool --platform=all --arch=all
scripts.build-lin: npm run delete-lin-build && npm run remove-dist && electron-packager . agent-transparency-tool --platform=linux --arch=all
scripts.build-mac: npm run delete-mac-build && npm run remove-dist && electron-packager . agent-transparency-tool --platform=darwin --arch=all
scripts.build-win: npm run delete-win-build && npm run remove-dist && electron-packager . agent-transparency-tool --platform=win32 --arch=all
